comment: (On Thursday of February 2, 2023).  Rules of Inheritance in the Scientific ambient of Genetics (Genomics Therein):  1) Pedigree (Wild Type Allele Manifestation and Variation Allele); 2) Autosomal Dominant/Recessive Inheritance Patterns and 3) Sex-Linked Inheritance; 4) Genotype is the Genetic Manifestation Present within the Genome (Gemetogenesis Influcenc, Environmental Also); 5) Phenotype is the Manifestation of the Genotype (Resulting in Characteristics of Morphology or even Physiology) with the Possibility of Somatic Variation (Environmentally Induced Changes to the Genotype and post-developmental for which Phenotype Manifestation is Patent); 5) Eugenics and Hybridization Culture;   PhD Adam Martin, es geht sehr gut zu geborn Sein aber es gut auch zu Tod haben vor Geburst manchmal.  Na ja.  Heil!
